name: Baller (Chickurken)
description:
'Baller' is in its beta development stages. With a sudden increase in other work Baller cannot presently reach its full potential. Although the developer hopes to continue with this project in future.

Use WASD to move around and collect gold flares before they turn red. Collect 10 red flares and lose a life. You have 3 lives to get the largest score possible.
